archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Knowledge Management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, The purpose of the Knowledge Management process is to create the capability and assets that enable the organization to exploit opportunities to re‐apply existing knowledge.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 158

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "Der Zweck des Prozesses "Wissensmanagement" ist es, die Fähigkeiten und Wissensbestände zu schaffen, mit denen die Organisation in die Lage versetzt wird, Chancen zu nutzen und bestehendes Wissen erneut anzuwenden".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, The purpose of the Knowledge Management process is to create the capability and assets that enable the organization to exploit opportunities to re‐apply existing knowledge.
